name: 斯蒂芬·格雷
introduction: Stephen Gray is a Canadian-born multidisciplinary creative who excels in directing, producing, and editing. He's best known for his feature film "After Death", slated for release in theaters October, 2023. This film explores one of life's biggest mysteries - "what happens when we die?" with New York Times bestselling authors, doctors, scientists, and survivors. His work also includes award-winning short films and commercials, having partnered with brands like Target, Leisure Travel Vans, Google, and Pepsi.
